body: If a staff app and interview get accepted, how do mods check people's reports?
body_tagged: If a staff app and interview get accepted, how do mods check people's reports?
title: Question if a staff app gets accepted

replies.body: Ask it in the Application assistance's Thread. That thread is for ask questions about Staff Applications to the Sr Staff. :/
